missing_keywords.keyword: 3+ years of experience in software development

experience_alignment: The candidate has relevant internship experience in software engineering roles, demonstrating skills in front-end and back-end development. The experience aligns well with the job description, although the candidate should emphasize projects that showcase experience with microservices.
education_alignment: The candidate's Bachelor's degree in Computer Science aligns with the job requirements. Highlighting relevant coursework (e.g., distributed systems) could further strengthen the match.
improvement_suggestions: Quantify achievements in resume using metrics to demonstrate impact, e.g., 'Improved application performance by X%'.
Add a project or experience that showcases experience with microservices to address the missing 'Microservices' keyword.
Explicitly mention 'Azure' in the resume if the candidate has any experience with it, even if it's a personal project.

In the resume summary or in the experience descriptions, explicitly state or rephrase to reflect '3+ years of experience in software development' to meet the requirement. Even internships can contribute towards this if framed correctly.
Tailor the resume to emphasize experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure).
Include a brief summary at the beginning of the resume highlighting key skills and experience relevant to the job description.
